title: LMAO @ THE SYNDRA AND ZED BUFFS
body:
IM LAUGHING SO HARD 

I mean Syndra has been not very impressive for quite a while but still these buffs are hilarious

and ZED being buffed is just pure comedy i'm cackling i can't wait to see what happens if this goes live

replies.body:
Surrender@20:

Zed
~~Shadow Slash (E) damage increased to 80/130/180/230/280 from 60/90/120/150/180~~
[Context: Calm it down. Exgeniar confirmed this was a bug. ]
Zed buff is a bug. Syndra buff won't even help her that much, she'll still be bad.

> [{quoted}](name=finkypop,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dPGns1EE,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-20T20:25:53.680+0000)
>
> IM LAUGHING SO HARD 
> 
> I mean Syndra has been not very impressive for quite a while but still these buffs are hilarious
> 
> and ZED being buffed is just pure comedy i'm cackling i can't wait to see what happens if this goes live

zed buff confirmed bugg

what is wrong with the syndra buffs?
Well they have to be buffed **together,** Riot ships them after all :D
I laughed so hard as well and even made a thread about it. Riot going full retard.
Yea... let's give a melee, mobile, mana-less assassin even better wave-clear & harass power :D
